paper_abstract: In a recently published paper, Moghaddam and DePuy employed chance constrained programming (CCP) method to model and solve a farm management problem (Moghaddam and DePuy, 2011). In this note we show that the application of CCP and some presented results were incorrect. The required corrections are proposed. (c) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on article "Farm management optimization using chance constrained programming method"
